(d) DEFINITIONS.—In this section:

(1) ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE.—The term ‘‘ar-
11

12

14
(2) ARTIFICIAL
INTELLIGENCE

15
term ‘‘artificial intelligence model’’ means a software
16
component of an information system that imple-
17
ments artificial intelligence technology and uses
18
computational, statistical, or machine-learning tech-
19
niques to produce outputs from a defined set of in-
20
puts.
21
(3) ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM.—The
22
term ‘‘artificial intelligence system’’ means any data
23

24

4

5

6

SEC. 80181. RENEWABLE ENERGY FEES ON FEDERAL
6
LANDS.
7
(a) ACREAGE RENT FOR WIND AND SOLAR RIGHTS-
8
OF-WAY.—
9
(1) IN GENERAL.—Under the second sentence
10
of section 504(g) of the Federal Land Policy and
11
Management Act of 1976 (43 U.S.C. 1764(g)), the
12
Secretary shall, subject to paragraph (3) and not
13

14

15
ergy project an acreage rent in an amount based on
16
the equation described in paragraph (2).
17
(2) CALCULATION OF ACREAGE RENT RATE.—
18
(A) EQUATION.—The amount of an acre-
19
age rent collected under paragraph (1) shall be
20
determined using the following equation: Acre-
21
age rent = A × B × ((1 + C)D)).
22
(B) DEFINITIONS.—For purposes of sub-
23
paragraph (A):
24
--- Page 598 ---
598
•HR 1 EH1S
(i) The letter ‘‘A’’ means the Per-Acre
1
Rate.
2
(ii) The letter ‘‘B’’ means the Encum-
3
brance Factor.
4
(iii) The letter ‘‘C’’ means the Annual
5
Adjustment Factor.
6
(iv) The letter ‘‘D’’ means the year in
7
the term of the right-of-way.
8
(3) PAYMENT UNTIL PRODUCTION.—The holder
9
of a right-of-way for a renewable energy project shall
10
pay an acreage rent collected under paragraph (1)
11
until the date on which energy generation begins.
12
(b) CAPACITY FEES.—

(1) IN GENERAL.—The Secretary shall, subject
14
to paragraph (2), annually collect a capacity fee
15
from the holder of a right-of-way for a renewable en-
16
ergy project based on the amount described in para-
17
graph (2).

(2) CALCULATION
OF
CAPACITY
FEE.—The
19

(1) shall be equal to the greater of—

(A) an amount equal to the acreage rent
22
described in subsection (a); and
23
--- Page 599 ---
599
•HR 1 EH1S
(B) 4.58 percent of the gross proceeds
